directions: Combine tangerine juice, vodka, lemon juice, simple syrup, orange liqueur, and egg white in a cocktail shaker. Secure lid onto shaker and shake until the cocktail is creamy, at least 1 minutes.
Add ice to shaker. Again secure lid onto shaker and shake for several seconds. Strain cocktail into stemware and garnish with tangerine twist.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)
title: Tangerine Dream Cocktail
